title: Tax Code’s Race Bias Runs Deep
itunes:title: Tax Code’s Race Bias Runs Deep
description:
Emory Law Professor Dorothy Brown discusses her book "The Whiteness of Wealth: How the Tax System Impoverishes Black Americans and How We Can Fix It."

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
